CustomField.description: Provide a semi-colon separated list of fields to display on the card. Do not use dot operators such as if the object was Case and the field desired was the related Account name, use AccountId, not Account.Name. ex on Case - AccountId;ContactId;
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Provide a semi-colon separated list of fields to display on the card. Do not use dot operators such as if the object was Case and the field desired was the related Account name, use AccountId, not Account.Name - Case - AccountId;ContactId;
CustomField.label: Fields To Display on Card
